item.title: New Release - 0.2.1
item.description: In order to allow Cake to correctly load addin's, we have updated the NuGet package structure to include a lib folder.
item.author: gep13

item.title: New Release - 0.2.0
item.description: After the initial release of Cake.Coveralls a couple days ago, we noticed a couple problems, that warranted a new release, so here it is.
item.author: gep13

item.title: New Release - 0.1.0
item.description: Very happy to announce the initial release of the Cake.Coveralls addin for Cake.
item.author: gep13
